Class IOUtils

    • uk.ac.ebi.utils.io.IOUtils
  • public class IOUtils
extends Object
    Miscellanea of small IO utilities
    date
    July 29, 2007, 1:03 PM
    Author:
    brandizi

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static String getHash​(File f, String algorithm)
      A wrapper to getHash(InputStream, String) that opens a file.
      static String getHash​(InputStream is, String algorithm)
      Reads the input stream and returns an hash for it, based on the algorithm passed as parameter.
      static String getHash​(String string, String algorithm)
      Hashes a string, using getHash(InputStream, String).

      A wrapper of #getHash(InputStream, File) that uses the MD5 algorithm.

      A wrapper of getHash(InputStream, String) that uses the MD5 algorithm.

      A wrapper for getHash(String, String) that uses MD5.

      Defaults to "UTF-8"

        public static String getHash​(InputStream is,
                             String algorithm)
                      throws IOException,
                             NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Reads the input stream and returns an hash for it, based on the algorithm passed as parameter. algorithm is passed to MessageDigest

        IOException

      • uri

        public static URI uri​(String uriStr)
        Creates a URI and intercepts of URISyntaxException, throwing IllegalArgumentException if such an exception occurs. I've created this method because it's often very annoying to have a checked exception here.
